page:
| Grade Level | Required standards | |-------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **Core** | - Program correctly receives input, validates commands, and displays images
- Program correctly implements the `darken`, `sepia`, and `grayscale` filter functionality | | **Advanced** | - Program correctly makes borders, flips, and mirrors images
- Program correctly creates the collage image
- There is no unused code
- Variable names are clear and informative and use a consistent style
- "Magic Numbers" have appropriate names in UPPER_SNAKE_CASE | | **Excellent** | - Program correctly create the green screen image
- Code has no large sections of duplicate code and is broken into additional functions where appropriate
- Code is easy to read
- Functions have appropriate docstrings |
